records.name: Six Senses Laamu

descriptions.direction: Located in Olhuveli, Six Senses Laamu is in a rural area and on a private beach. Local points of interest include Siraajudheen Mosque, Paree Fengandu, and Masjudhul Zikraa. With surfing/body boarding, boat tours, and fishing nearby, you'll find plenty of adventures in the water.
descriptions.general: General description: In the vicinity of the hotel´s own sandy beach is situated the hotel Six Senses Laamu. It is linked by a free shuttle service. The airport (MLE) is approx. 259 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee). Amenities: Partially renovated in 2022, the spa hotel has 94 rooms in total. It is equipped with a reception (check-in from 14:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, an air conditioning, a safe (for free), a shop, a cinema as well as a money changing facility. For the meals, there are three restaurants. You will be warmly welcomed in both the hotel’s bars. WiFi is available for free. Room cleaning is free of charge. Room service, laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. For the concierge service the hotel charges a fee (where applicable). Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one pool. Here, there are sun loungers for free available. At the pool bar you can get refreshing beverages. Meals: Breakfast from the buffet. Half board: breakfast and dinner. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Fitness, yoga and pilates. At the beach different watersport types such as jet skiing and water skiing are available (partly from local providers). Bicycle rental. Steam bath free of charge. Spa area and massages available (where applicable for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English, Russian, Spanish, Chinese and Portuguese. Accepted methods of payment: Euro / MasterCard, Visa and American Express. Beach Family Villa (Private Pool - Seaplane): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (for a fee), capsule coffee machine (for free), internet (for free) and safe (for free) as well as individually adjustable air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Water LagoonVilla (Seaplane Included): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (for a fee), capsule coffee machine (for free), internet (for free) and safe (for free) as well as individually adjustable air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Ocean Water Villa (Private Pool - Seaplane): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (for a fee), capsule coffee machine (for free), internet (for free) and safe (for free) as well as individually adjustable air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Ocean Water Villa (Seaplane Included): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (for a fee), capsule coffee machine (for free), internet (for free) and safe (for free) as well as individually adjustable air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Lagoon Beach Villa (Private Pool - Seaplane): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (for a fee), capsule coffee machine (for free), internet (for free) and safe (for free) as well as individually adjustable air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 2 Bedroom Lagoon Beach Villa (Private Pool - Seaplane): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (for a fee), capsule coffee machine (for free), internet (for free) and safe (for free) as well as individually adjustable air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Laamu Water Villa (Private Pool - Seaplane): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (for a fee), capsule coffee machine (for free), internet (for free) and safe (for free) as well as individually adjustable air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Laamu Water Villa (Seaplane Included): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (for a fee), capsule coffee machine (for free), internet (for free) and safe (for free) as well as individually adjustable air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Laamu Water Villa (Sunset View, Private Pool - Seaplane): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (for a fee), capsule coffee machine (for free), internet (for free) and safe (for free) as well as individually adjustable air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Laamu Water Villa (Sunset View, Seaplane Included): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (for a fee), capsule coffee machine (for free), internet (for free) and safe (for free) as well as individually adjustable air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Ocean Beach Villa (Private Pool - Seaplane): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (for a fee), capsule coffee machine (for free), internet (for free) and safe (for free) as well as individually adjustable air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. 2 Bedroom Ocean Beach Villa (Private Pool - Seaplane): With balcony or terrace, kettle (where applicable, for a fee), minibar (for a fee), capsule coffee machine (for free), internet (for free) and safe (for free) as well as individually adjustable air conditioning. Bathroom with bathtub and shower. Mandatory Domestic + Speedboat Transfers to all guests from Male International Airport to 50 minutes flights to Laamu Kadhdhoo Domestic Airport followed by 15 minutes Speedboat ride to the resort.
